channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for TN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for TN

item.title: Report X-2023080721
item.description:
Report X-2023080721

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-06T15:11:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-04
  • City: MURFREESBORO
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat package was unloaded at door 21 at about 4:00AM on 08/04/2023. Upon being unloaded from the trailer, the package was covered with a black/purple stain. Absorbent pads were immediately used to contain the spill and a black tote was brought over from Quality Assurance upon notification. DescribePack: A 4.0 Liter bottle of Sysmex ColorWright Stain (UN1230) leaked out due to a loose cap on the plastic bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: To control the spill, absorbent pads were used immediately and Quality Assurance was called to assess the spill, in which a black tote was used to prevent any more leakage on the dock.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED DURRING UNLOAD - OUTER PAKCING WAS WET AND STICKY DescribePack: THE INNER PACKAGE HAD SEVERAL LARGE DENTS WHICH CAUSE SMALL TEARS IN THE BODY OF THE METAL DRUM AND INNER LEAKAGE DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE UPRIGHTED, PLACED IN TOTE AND MOVED TO CAGE

item.title: Report X-2023080657
item.description:
Report X-2023080657

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-31T21:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-03
  • City: COOKEVILLE
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was loaded at the bottom of fully loaded wall in a trailer. Too much weight was loaded on top of the Hazmat and the caps became loose and began to leak liquid from the closures. DescribePack: Loose cap on gallon jugs allowed fluid to leak out of the top DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: caps were tightened and box was placed under hazmat fan to draw fumes away from

item.title: Report E-2023080785
item.description:
Report E-2023080785

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-05T15:12:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-24
  • City: Jackson
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO CNW, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: While in transit, due to improper loading, a load shift occurred resulting in the release of 30 gallons of Spartan Shineline Emulsifier Plus, UN1760, from (6) 5-Gallon pails. The wooden trailer floor was impacted with product as well as asphalt outside of the trailer. HAZMAT contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup. A neutralizing agent was used during the remediation process.
